title: I need 10 Rp
body:
Can I get 10 rp?
I need them  for a  hextech key.I can give you drawing in exchange.

replies.body: Maybe we can work something out!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).  We'll take a look into your request individually to see what we can do!
i've  already sent a ticket with the drawing.
When i'll get those juicy 10 rp???
